DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize periconceptional iron supplementation marry , nulliparous woman rural Bangladesh significantly reduce anemia improve hemoglobin concentration pregnancy .
DOC.detailed_description: In 2007 , National Strategy Anemia Prevention Control Bangladesh include adolescent newly marry woman target group future iron folic acid ( IFA ) supplementation program . This double-blinded RCT examine effect daily periconceptional IFA vs. folic acid ( FA ) anemia iron indictors pregnancy among married , nulliparous woman rural Bangladesh . Biochemical index collect baseline either 15 week gestation 9 month among non-pregnant woman ( NPW ) .
DOC.criteria: Women eligible : Married Nulliparous < 40 year old Living household husband Women exclude : Pregnant enrollment Planning move region Using iron supplement within previous 3 month Using implant form birth control , surgery prevent pregnancy Women Hb concentration < 70 g/L , define severely anemic accord WHO definition ( 5 ) , exclude study appropriately treat
